readable.title: 2441313372_6a1d59582b
readable.content: A boy sleeps in a hospital bed while wearing a cast on his arm . A boy wearing an arm cast lying in a hospital bed A boy with an injured right arm and wearing blue shorts is lying on a bed with a towel . A young boy with a broken arm sleeping in a hospital bed . A young boy with a cast on his arm is lying on a hospital bed .
